text:
Highly recommended places, Dr Lim did such an amazing work and he explained everything in fully details and assure his patient feels comfortable and knowing in a good hand.

Jessy as their podiatrist did such an excellent job and explain every details patiently and very friendly.

Once again, the clinic is highly recommended and you will be in a good hand under Dr Lim and Jessy

It is a small clinic, as they are sharing it with another specialist. Donâ€™t be fooled by it, as they have excellent podiatrist, Jessie (she looks so stern & fierce, but so meticulous and patient haha), & doctors. We received the best care, under the care of Dr Stephen Kum & Dr Tan Yih Kai. The clinic manager, Jean was also gentle & motherly. It was stressful journey having to take care of ulcer wound, and the blood tests. And the physical journeys to & fro every 2-3 days for wound dressing were tedious, but this clinic team definitely makes the journey less stressful. Full recovery of ulcer wound under their care & TLC.

Excellent Surgeon.  Dr Kum is very patient and explained my conditions in details.  He even treated me for my toes problem which wasn't even related to my initial consultation with him.  After his treatment, my problems on my feet is completely resolved.  Thank you Dr Kum!!
Dr tan is a very good, patient, kind and professional doctor. He treats my legs very very well. Thank you very very much Dr Tan!
Nice and friendly doctors and staff. Always willing to help you get better which is much appreciated!
